thread.section_title: Maine Lobster Now Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Maine Lobster Now | www.mainelobsternow.com
thread.title: Loretta
thread.title_full: Maine Lobster Now reviewed by Loretta

author: Loretta
title: Loretta
text: My first experience was at Christmas when we received the Lobster roll package as a gift. My husband had been wanting to try lobster rolls for sometime and was really impressed. I recently purchased the Lobster roll package for my husband as a birthday gift. He loved it! Great service and product from Maine Lobster Now! I definitely recommend.
